content: New Relic alerts when CPU usage exceeds 85% for more than 5 minutes.
MongoDB replica set sync issues can cause read delays.
Splunk logs indicate service availability with uptime percentages.
Confluence page on escalation process during database outages.
Response time spikes tracked via Splunk APM can highlight bottlenecks.
Tracking client IP address helps in identifying suspicious activities.
Payload encryption is enabled to secure sensitive data transmission.
Service availability is monitored 24/7 using multiple monitoring tools.
Database connection pool exhaustion can lead to application slowdowns.
VPN access requests follow an approval workflow documented in Confluence.
